incidents.name: Sender ID Service Returning High Latency Errored Responses

incident_updates.body: Sender ID was degraded for 3 hours and 8 minutes between 16:19 and 19:27  Pacific Time on 11/13/23. During this period of time customers may have experienced high latency in errored responses for Sender ID. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Facebook Messenger Experiencing Message Delivery Issues

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the Facebook Messenger issue, and it was determined that the impact was limited to a small set of customers, who have been contacted individually to address any concerns. All systems are operational.
Facebook Messenger is experiencing issues with message delivery due to a Meta issue impacting App messaging permissions. A fix was deployed by Meta and we are starting to see recovery.

We've become aware of a potential issue impacting delivery of Facebook Messenger messages. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio Console Not Logging in or Loading for Logged-in Users

incident_updates.body: All services impacted by an issue with Twilio Console have recovered and are operating as intended. This incident has been resolved.

We are observing recovery; please note that some users may still receive errors or experience some latencies when logging into the Twilio Console. Engineering teams continue working to ensure errors are completely resolved. We will provide another update in 12 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are observing recovery; please note that some users may still receive errors or experience some latencies when logging into the Twilio Console. Engineering teams continue working to ensure errors are completely resolved. We will provide another update in 12 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are still working on resolving the issue causing degraded performance on our account portal; users may still be unable to log in to the Twilio Console. Our engineering team is working diligently to remediate the issue.

Flex customers who have SSO setup through a 3rd party Identity Provider (Google, Okta, Salesforce, etc.) will be able to log into Flex this way without issue; login from Console is the only login method not working.

We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with our Voice product. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Twilio Flex and TaskRouter Voice Traffic Failures

incident_updates.body: Twilio Flex and TaskRouter voice traffic was degraded for 18 minutes between 12:52 PM and 1:10 PM Pacific Time on 11/09/2023. During this period of time customers may have experienced failures in voice traffic. The issue has now been resolved. If you are still experiencing any ongoing issues with calls and notice stuck tasks, we recommend you complete any existing or stuck tasks via the API and try again. You may follow this path: https://taskrouter.twilio.com/v1/Workspaces/WSxxx/Tasks/WTxxx -d AssignmentStatus=Completed.
